text: White: Based on the results of the experiment, we opted for the white paint color, in fact because inside the niche that Brandi and Jerry want to design the temperature will be less important because it is a less dark paint color, so opting for the white color will allow them to design a niche that absorbs a less significant amount of heat inside the niche compared to a dark color for example the black color for the niche that will instead absorb a significant amount of heat.
